meaningMnemonic: The more <radical>shellfish</radical> you <radical>have</radical>, the more you can <kanji>bribe</kanji> people. That worked in the olden days when shells were money, and today too if the people you want to bribe really like seafood.
readingMnemonic: Welp, the cops found out about your <kanji>bribe</kanji>, that didn't last long, and now your entire family is watching you get put into the police car screaming, "<reading>WHY</reading> (わい)?!
